text: Juozas Preikšas (22 November 1926 - 11 February 2018) was a Roman Catholic bishop. Preikšas was ordained to the priesthood. He served as auxiliary bishop of the Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Kaunas, Lithuania. He then served as bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Panevėžys from 1991 to 2002.Diocese of Paneveszys ==Notes== Category:1926 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Lithuanian Roman Catholic bishops
title: Juozas Preikšas
